H1.extra: anwarikRa kA xevawA inxra BArawIya AryoM kA vqRti-xevawA hE, vexoM meM praWama SreNI ke xevawAoM meM inakA varNana milawA hE, paranwu purANoM kI xqRti se yaha xviwIya SreNI ke xevawA mAneM jAwe hEMyaha kaSyapa Ora axiwi ke eka puwra hEM brahmA, viRNu Ora maheSa ke wrika se yaha nimnawara hE, paranwu yaha Ora xUsare xevawAoM meM pramuKa hEM Ora sAmAnyawaH inheM sureSa yA xevenxra Axi nAmoM se pukArA jAwA hE jEsA ki vexoM meM varNiwa hE usI prakAra purANoM meM BI yaha anwarikRa waWA pUrva xiSA ke aXiRTAwq xevawA mAne jAwe hEM, inakA loka svarga loka kahalAwA hE yaha vajra XAraNa karawe hEM, bijalI ko Bejawe hEM Ora varRA karawe hEM, yaha asuroM ke sAWa prAyaH yuxXa meM lage rahawe hEM Ora unako BayaBIwa karawe rahawe hEM, paranwu kaI bAra unase parAswa BI ho jAwe hEM purANoM meM varNiwa inxra kAmukawA Ora vyaBicAra ke lie praKyAwa hEM, isakA sabase badZA uxAharaNa unake xvArA gOwama kI pawnI ahalyA kA sawIwvaharaNa hE jisake kAraNa inxra ahalyA-jAra kahalAwA hE gOwama qRi ke SApa se inxra ke SarIra para swrI-yoni jEse hajAra cihna bana jAwe hEM isIlie use sayoni kahawe hEM, paranwu bAxa meM yaha cihna 'AzKa' ke rUpa meM baxala jAwe hEM isalie yaha sahasranewra, sahasrayoni yA sahasrAkRa kahalAne lagawe hEM rAmAyaNa meM varNana AwA hE ki rAvaNa ke puwra meGanAxa ne inxra ko parAswa kara xiyA waWA vaha use uTA kara laMkA meM le gayA, isI sAhasika kArya karane ke upalakRa meM meGanAxa ko 'inxrajiw' kI upAXi milI brahmA waWA xUsare xevawAoM ke bIca meM padZane para kahIM inxra kA CutakArA huAinxra ke viRaya meM bahuXA varNana milawA hE ki vaha saxEva rAjAoM ko 100 yajFa pUrA karane se rokawA rahawA hE, kyoMki yaha viSvAsa kiyA jAwA hE ki jo koI 100 yajFa pUrA kara legA, vahI inxra kA paxa prApwa kara legA, yahI kAraNa hE ki vaha sagara Ora raGu ke yajFIya GodZoM ko uTA kara le gayA, xe* raGu* wqwIya sarga yaha saxEva Gora wapaScaryA karane vAle qRi-muniyoM se BayaBIwa rahawA hE Ora apsarAeM Beja kara unake mArga meM viGna dAlane kA prayawna karawA hE xe* apsaras kahA jAwA hE ki usane parvawa ke paMKa kAta dAle jaba ki vaha kaRta xene lage WeusI samaya usane bala waWA vqwra kI hawyA kara xI inakI pawnI pulomA rAkRasa kI puwrI hE, inake puwra kA nAma jayanwa hE yaha arjuna ke piwA BI kahe jAwe hEM
